tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_data (
    customer_id INT,
    customer_name VARCHAR,
    email_address VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    subscription_status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    email VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    customer_email VARCHAR(100),
    customer_age INT,
    customer_gender CHAR,
    customer_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE purchase_history (
    purchase_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    purchase_date DATE,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    product_category VARCHAR(50),
    purchase_amount FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_segments (
    segment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    segment_name VARCHAR(50),
    segment_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    email_address VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    registration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    purchase_date DATE
);
CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT, customer_name VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), phone_number VARCHAR(15) );
CREATE TABLE orders (order_id INT, customer_id INT, order_date DATE, total_amount DECIMAL(10,2) );
CREATE TABLE products (product_id INT, product_name VARCHAR(255), price DECIMAL(10,2), category VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE promotions (promotion_id INT, promotion_name VARCHAR(255), start_date DATE, end_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE customer_segments (segment_id INT, segment_name VARCHAR(50), segment_description TEXT );
